title: Fragment, ca. 1800–05
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate, plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp: 67cm (26 1/2in.). Weft: 83cm (32 3/4in.). Two pieces sewn together horizontally. All edges cut.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 25.5cm, (10in.).
description: Medallions and cartouches containing a sphinx, a putti on a bull, a seated woman with an oil lamp and a seated woman holding an owl surrounded by women in classical dress, garlands and animals. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ca. 1800–05.
ca. 1800–05. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate, plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-65.
